      • connect

        public Node connect(java.lang.String connectionIdentifier,
           java.util.Map<ConnectionConstants,java.lang.String> params)
        Description copied from interface: IPluginInConnectionService
        Connect to a node
        Specified by:
        connect in interface IPluginInConnectionService
        Parameters:
        connectionIdentifier - Convenient identifier for the applications to make use of
        params - Connection Params in Map format. This is entirely handled by the south-bound plugins and is an opaque value for SAL. Typical values keyed inside this params are Management IP-Address, Username, Password, Security Keys, etc...
        Returns:
        Node
